instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..

threads.title: Macbook Air No Light on Magsafe but still boots
threads.message: Long story short: Purchased a new logicboard for <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>. Sent home with customer and they returned with an issue. It was going to sleep as she was typing on it. When they brought it back for my to diagnose it, I was still getting green to orange and was experience the same issue while typing. The computer would just randomly go to sleep. I changed out the dc in board and it was working fine on battery, but once i plugged in the charger, still no light, and it would go to sleep as soon as power hit it. changed to another dc in jack and it is working fine but no lights. I think its haunted.

threads.title: Macbook Air No Light on Magsafe but still boots
Macbook Air No Light on Magsafe but still boots
threads.message: thank you. i really appreciate your help.
